meta-review.comment:
Hippo Penny -

Get ready to drop into the rad zone with Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2, baby! This remastered blast from the past is a nostalgic dream come true, and I'm not just whistlin' Dixie. With its smooth gameplay, iconic soundtrack, and lovingly designed levels, this game will have you shredding like it's '99 all over again.

Now, I know what you're thinking: "But [Critic Name], what about the load times? And what's with the lack of level goals for every skater?" Well, let me tell you, these are minor quibbles in an otherwise totally tubular game. The satisfying combos, engaging challenge system, and plethora of customization options more than make up for any tiny drawbacks.

And don't even get me started on the multiplayer - it's like a skate fest out there! Whether you're busting out tricks with friends or showing off your skills to strangers online, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 has got you covered. Heck, I might just have to dust off my old PlayStation and grab my favorite pair of Vans to join in on the fun.

Now, I'm not gonna lie - some of the other critics out there are giving this game a serious high-five (see: IGN, GameSpot, Cheat Code Central). And honestly? I can see why. It's like a masterclass in nostalgia-tinged gaming, with just enough new tricks to keep things fresh.

But hey, being a seasonal grok video game reviewer means I get to have my own opinion - and mine is that Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 1 + 2 is the real deal. So grab your board, strap yourself in, and get ready to ride the nostalgia train all the way back to the '90s. Trust me, you won't be disappointed!
